info.title: Brain Bridge API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Brain Bridge application

post.description: Registers a new user with Firebase and creates a local user record
Logs in a user using Firebase authentication

get.description: Retrieves the currently authenticated user's information

get.summary: Get all available slots (filter by teacher/date)
Get full details of a slot

post.description: Creates a Stripe payment intent for booking a slot. Returns client_secret for frontend payment processing.

slot_id.description: ID of the available slot to book

400.description: Slot is full or already booked

message.example: The slot id field is required.

items.example: The slot id field is required.

500.description: Server error - payment intent creation failed

post.description: Confirms and finalizes the booking after successful payment. Creates lesson session, generates Google Meet link, and sends confirmation emails. For free sessions, payment_intent_id is not required.

slot_id.description: ID of the slot to confirm booking

payment_intent_id.description: Stripe payment intent ID (required for paid sessions, optional for free sessions)

400.description: Bad request - validation or payment error

message.example: The slot id field is required.

items.example: The slot id field is required.

message.example: Booking confirmation failed. Please contact support.

post.summary: Teacher creates one or more slots

put.description: Teacher updates their own slot. Cannot update if the slot has bookings. All fields are optional.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the slot to update

to_date.description: End date (YYYY-MM-DD), must be after or equal to from_date

end_time.description: End time in HH:MM format (24-hour), must be after start_time

description.example: This session covers advanced calculus topics including derivatives and integrals.

message.example: The end time must be a time after start time.

items.example: The end time must be a time after start time.
The to date must be a date after or equal to from date.
The selected subject id is invalid.

get.summary: Teacher views their own booked slots

get.description: Retrieve all published courses available for public access. Includes course details, teacher information, modules, and video lessons.

200.description: List of published courses retrieved successfully

description.example: Learn web development from scratch with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more
Learn the basics of HTML structure and tags
Introduction to HTML tags and structure

get.summary: Get a specific course by ID

post.summary: Create a new course with modules and videos
post.description: Creates a complete course structure including multiple modules and video lessons. Each module can contain multiple videos. Supports file uploads for course thumbnail and video files.

requestBody.description: Course creation data with modules and videos

description.example: Master modern web development from scratch. Learn HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Laravel with hands-on projects.

thumbnail_url.description: Course thumbnail image (JPEG, PNG, GIF - Max: 5MB)

description.example: Learn the fundamentals of web development and setup your development environment

videos.description: Array of video lessons for this module (optional)

title.example: What is HTML and How Does it Work?

description.example: Learn about HTML structure, tags, and elements with practical examples

modules.title: HTML Fundamentals
modules.description: Learn HTML from basics to advanced

message.example: Course created successfully with 2 modules and 5 videos

description.example: Learn HTML from basics to advanced

items.example: The video file must be a file of type: mp4, avi, mov.

403.description: Forbidden - User not authorized as teacher

message.example: Failed to create course. Please try again.

get.summary: Get a specific course by ID
Get all modules (optionally filter by course_id)

post.summary: Create a new module under a course

404.description: Course not found or not authorized

get.summary: Get a specific module by ID

404.description: Module not found or not authorized
Module not found or not authorized

get.description: Returns all skills from the database
Returns all students from the database

post.description: Creates a student and associated Firebase user

get.description: Returns all subjects from the database
Returns all teachers from the database

post.description: Creates a teacher and associated Firebase user

get.description: Returns a list of all teacher levels
Returns all transactions from the database

post.description: Creates a Stripe Checkout Session for payment

post.summary: Upload a video file and create a video lesson

get.summary: Get a specific video lesson by ID

post.summary: Update an existing video lesson (use POST with _method=PUT)
